```{r, include=FALSE}
options("width"=108)
pkg  <- basename(getwd())
tmp  <- packageDescription(pkg)
date <- as.Date(file.info("R")$mtime)
```

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat("#", tmp$Title)
```



<br><br>
**Version**

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(tmp$Version, "<br>\n", as.character(date))  
```


<br><br>
**Description**

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(tmp$Description)
```


<br><br>
**License**

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(tmp$License, "<br>")
cat(tmp$Author)
```


<br><br>
**Citation**


```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
citation(pkg)
```

<br><br>
**BibTex for citing**

<code style="white-space:normal;">
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
toBibtex(citation(pkg))
```
</code>

```{r, eval=FALSE}

```
